mapper.select: select g.*,pg.group_name as parent_name from user_group ug left join czp_group g on g.id=ug.group_id left join czp_group pg on pg.id=g.parent_id where ug.user_id=#{userId}
select u.* from czp_user u left join user_group ug on ug.user_id=u.id where ug.group_id=#{id} and ISNULL(ug.parent_id)
select g.*,pg.group_name as parent_name from czp_group g left join czp_group pg on pg.id=g.parent_id where g.id=#{id} or g.group_name like concat("%",#{id},"%")
select u.id from user_group ug left join czp_user u on u.id=ug.user_id where ug.group_id=#{id} and ISNULL(parent_id)
select id from czp_group where parent_id=#{id}
select u.*,ug.parent_id from user_group ug left join czp_user u on u.id=ug.user_id where ug.group_id=#{id} and NOT ISNULL(ug.parent_id)
select count(*) from user_group where group_id=#{id}
select * from czp_group order by rand() limit 10

select cg.*,g.num,cu.name,cu.avatar,pg.group_name as parentName from czp_group cg left join (select ug.group_id,count(ug.group_id) as num from user_group ug group by ug.group_id) as g on g.group_id=cg.id left join (select * from czp_user) cu on cu.id=cg.clan_elder left join (select * from czp_group) pg on pg.parent_id=cg.id
cg.id=#{id}
